results.title: Oral Metformin for Treating Dermatological Diseases: A Systematic Review.
results.text_hl: Objective: To comprehensively assess evidence regarding the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for treating primary @<m>DISEASE_Vasculitis_Leukocytoclastic_Cutaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018366 @@@cutaneous disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Sung CT, Chao T, Lee A, Foulad DP, Choi F, Juhasz M, Dobry A, Mesinkovska NA. Oral Metformin for Treating Dermatological Diseases: A Systematic Review. J Drugs Dermatol. 2020 Aug 1;19(8):713-720. PMID: 32845585

results.title: Metformin - For the dermatologist
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ though primarily an antidiabetic drug, has found to play an important role in a number of @<m>DISEASE_Vasculitis_Leukocytoclastic_Cutaneous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018366 @@@cutaneous disorders@@@.
